title: Husband You’re so Bad - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Josei   Mature   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Black Belly   Broken Engagement   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Cute Children   Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Marriage

description:
Five years ago, on the eve of their wedding, she fled with his best friend and made him a joke.

However, her life was not so beautiful!

They met again

She was a single mother, depended on others.>
